bill.title: Geothermal Resources Development; Permits
bill.description: Establishes a permitting process for geothermal resources development within agricultural, rural, and urban districts. Establishes application requirements for geothermal resources development within conservation districts. Effective 07/01/2020. (HD2)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Passed First Reading
Referred to EEP, WAL, FIN, referral sheet 2
Bill scheduled to be heard by EEP on Thursday, 01-31-13 8:30AM in House conference room 325.
The committee(s) on EEP recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 02-05-13.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 02-05-13 11:00AM in conference room 325.

The committees on EEP recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) C. Lee, Thielen, Evans, Hanohano, Kawakami, Lowen, Fale; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Cullen; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Coffman; and Excused: none.
Reported from EEP (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 220) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to WAL.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on WAL with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Cachola, Har, McDermott excused (3).
Bill scheduled to be heard by WAL on Monday, 02-11-13 8:30AM in House conference room 325.
The committee(s) on WAL recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 02-13-13 10:30AM.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Wednesday, 02-13-13 10:30AM in conference room 325.

The committees on WAL recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Evans, Cullen, Hanohano, C. Lee, Fale; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Lowen; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Coffman, Kawakami, Thielen.
Reported from WAL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 514) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.
Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Carroll, Coffman, Hanohano, Har, Kawakami, Ward excused (6).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Monday, 02-25-13 1:30PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 17 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Nishimoto, Johanson, Cullen, Hashem, Ing, Jordan, Kobayashi, Lowen, Morikawa, Onishi, Takayama, Tokioka, Woodson, Yamashita, Fukumoto, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 822), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) McDermott voting no (1) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 172).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to ENE/WTL/PSM, WAM.
The committee(s) on ENE/WTL/PSM has scheduled a public hearing on 03-21-13 3:15PM in conference room 225.
The committee on ENE deferred the measure.
The committee on PSM deferred the measure.
The committee on WTL deferred the measure.
Carried over to 2014 Regular Session.
